casebody.data:
Terre G. MATRANGA, John P. Greathouse, Jr., Gina F. Greathouse and James E. Greathouse
v.
PARISH ANESTHESIA OF JEFFERSON, LLC, Monica Wilkinson, CRNA, Christopher Cougle, M.D., and Louisiana Medical Mutual Insurance Company NO. 2018-C-1561 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 18, 2019 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
